description: Outputs of inference for the Document Question Answering task

score.description: The probability associated to the answer.

start.descrtiption: The start word index of the answer (in the OCR’d version of the input or provided word boxes).

end.descrtiption: The end word index of the answer (in the OCR’d version of the input or provided word boxes).

words.description: The index of each word/box pair that is in the answer
